text: Rapid City is the second most populous city in the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in the western part of the state on the eastern edge of the Black Hills. Rapid City is the county seat of Pennington County. It is a good starting point for the area around it, which is a tourist area. Local tourist sites include Mount Rushmore, the Black Hills, the Badlands, and Custer State Park. == Other websites == * Rapid City government website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota
title: Rapid City, South Dakota
